snippet: The designer discussed the need for efficiency, the difference an LVMH investment makes, and the problem with desks.
abstract: Interview with Jonathan Anderson, British designer behind label J W Anderson, in which he discusses his approach to his work and his workspace requirements; LMVH has invested in Anderson's company.
lead_paragraph: The designer discussed the need for efficiency, the difference an LVMH investment makes, and the problem with desks.

headline.print_headline: There Is a Method to His Madness
headline.main: J. W. Anderson: Clear Desks, Full Days

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
